price: Lalle ne waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, Ubangijinsu Yanã shiryar da su sabõda ĩmãninsu, ƙõramu sunã gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu, a cikin gidãjen Aljannar ni'ima.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ يَهۡدِيهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِإِيمَٰنِهِمۡۖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti yahdīhim rabbuhum biīmānihim tajrī min taḥtihimu al-anhāru fī jannāti al-naʿīmi
